; R3 <= DM_Addr
; R4 <= positive #
; R5 <= negative #
; This program will incremement through the addresses in the data memory and 
; if the address is a multiple of 2, it will store the address # otherwise 
; it will store the negative address #
SUB R3, R3, R3
SUB R4, R4, R4
SUB R5, R5, R5
CMP R3, 512
BEQ #28
ADD R4, R4, 1
SUB R5, R5, 1
AND R6, R3, 1
CMP R6, 0
STREQ R4, [R3], #0
STRNE R5, [R3], #0
ADD R3, R3, 1
B #-44
B #-8


-------
E0433003
E0444004
E0455005
E3531000
0A000007
E2844001
E2455001
E2036001
E3560000
04834000
14835000
E2833001
EAFFFFF5
EAFFFFFE

00001010000000000000000000000111
11100010100001000100000000000001
11100010010001010101000000000001
11100010000000110110000000000001
11100011010101100000000000000000
00000100100000110100000000000000
00010100100000110101000000000000
11100010100000110011000000000001
11101010111111111111111111110101
11101010111111111111111111111110
